channel.title: Project BattlePkScape
channel.description:
I Am Planning To Create A Server Called BattlePkScape.
I Need To Find out Some Valuable InformationFirst
What Source Do You Reckon I Should Start With ?
I Have Made Numerous Servers Before So Im Not A Noob To This.
I Have A Perfect Compiler Which Im Gonna Extract To This New Source.
I Need Codes For Specials
If You Wish To Help Me I Suppose You Could Code Bits Nd Bobs For Me?
If So Please Post Saying U Will =D
So I Know How To Make New Starting Places , Add Global Objects Etc,
But If I Get People Posting Me Some Codes For Items To Add,
Such As Commands Etc, It Would Be Very Helpfull
If You Wish To Help Out In This Project.
Please Leave Your Name , Wanted Job , Experience
KthnxBi
No Posts Will Be Left Unanswered ...
Although I Have T Go In An Hour As Im Going To My Dads Today.
But Ill Be Back On Tomoz,
After 3ish
Up Until 12PM Maybe 1am .
Okay ThankYou
And Pl0x Help =D :)
